result.title: Evaluating Distributed scalable information cascade analysis. 4th section.
result.description: This deliverable details the models used for (dis)information cascade modeling at scale and evaluate the potential to scale from mono platform to multi- and interoperable platform and media information flow analysis. This section will focus on action needed in order to establish a robust method to be used in the centers and observatory.
